/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the urban landscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. Cars and buses, integral to the city's rhythm, traverse the road, while pedestrians add a human element to the scene. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape. The image is slightly blurred, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the scene.
